name: 2.Datasets
content:
Datasets Overview

The following datasets were used across different stages of the supply chain optimization project, ranging from demand forecasting and supplier capabilities to cost modeling and logistics planning.


1. Demand Data

Description: Contains product demand information for each project.

Columns:

  • ProjectId: Unique identifier for projects (e.g., 1384151, 1705532)
  • Product: Product ID (e.g., TTU : 46204, TTU : 46231)
  • TotalQuantity: Total units required for the project-product combination


Product Data

Description: Contains physical specifications of each product.

Columns:

  • Product: Product ID (matches Demand.csv)
  • Length: Length in meter.
  • Thickness: Thickness in mm
  • Weight: Weight in KG
  • BundleSize: Fixed at 42 units per bundle for all products


Project Data

Description: Contains project location and timeline information.

Columns:

  • ProjectId: Matches Demand.csv
  • lat, long: Geographic coordinates
  • StartWeek, EndWeek: Project duration in weeks


Supplier Data

Description: Contains supplier capabilities and locations.

Columns:

  • Supplier: Company name and location
  • YearlyMinOrder: Minimum annual order in quantity
  • DefectRate: Quality defect rate, optional.
  • lat, long: Geographic coordinates


Supplier Product Price Data

Description: Contains pricing and capacity information by supplier-product.

Columns:

  • Supplier: Matches Supplier.csv
  • Product: Matches Product.csv
  • CostPerUnit: Price per unit in USD
  • WeeklyCapasity: Weekly production capacity in units


Supplier Project Data

Description: Contains distance in miles between suppliers and project site along with cost per mile .

Columns:

  • Supplier: Matches Supplier.csv
  • ProjectId: The unique id for project under consideration
  • Distance: The distance between suppler and project site in miles
  • CostPerMile: Transportation cost per mile


Truck Data

Description: Contains truck specifications for transportation.

Columns:

  • TruckType: Currently only T1
  • Length: Total available length in meter
  • MaxChannel: Number of loading channels (6)
  • MaxWeight: Maximum payload capacity in KG



Data Relationships:

Demand-Product-Project:

  • Demand links to Products via ProductID
  • Demand links to Projects via ProjectID

Supplier-Product:

  • Supplier_Product_Price connects Suppliers to Products
  • Each supplier has specific products they can provide

Geographic:

  • All locations have precise coordinates for distance calculations
  • Projects are in CA and VA, suppliers spread across the country
